targets.expr: sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", deployment=~"hive-metastore"})*( sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", deployment=~"hive-metastore"} OR on() vector(1)) - 0.5)

panels.description: Shows the number of pods related to the hive-metastore in the namespace
panels.title: Pods Count

panels.description: Shows CPU usage by pods in the namespace
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Shows memory usage by pods in the namespace
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Shows network traffic in bytes per second for the pod
panels.title: Receive/Transmit Bandwidth
